means: 保持
保留
遵守
阻止
（食品）保持新
保持健康
保持，保养
供养，抚养
生活，生计
饲料；牧草
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 基普职业名称，受雇于城堡主楼者，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“维持，保卫”(to hold,defend)
Kentucky Environmental Education Program [美国]肯塔基环境教育大纲
Kyosato Education Experiment Project <日本>京三都教育实验计划
[计]保持语句

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"有，具有，持有"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: have, hold, own, possess, keep, enjoy
means: have ： 最常用词，可指任何情况下的具有，无论是物质的或精神的。
hold ： 指拥有并保持财产及持有见解等，暗示不让别人拿走或占有。
own不及本组的possess正式，多指所属关系，强调所有权，不管所属物是否在物主手中。
possess ： 较正式，指拥有或占有并能加以控制与支配，强调其归属；也指具有某种品质、才能、特点或性能等。
keep ： 指长时间地保有，保存某物，防止别人占去，强调安全和感情上的依附。
enjoy ： 指享有某种权利或长处，带有欣赏或喜爱的情感。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"保持，保存"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: keep, retain, reserve, preserve, conserve, withhold
means: keep ： 最常用词，指长时间牢固地保持或保存。
retain ： 指继续保持。
reserve ： 正式用词，指为了将来的用途或其他用途而保存、保留。
preserve ： 主要指为防止损害、变质等而保存。
conserve ： 一般指保存自然资源，保全人的精力、力量等。
withhold ： 指扣住不放，暗示有阻碍。

sentence.Network_en: Remember, keep a positive attitude and good things will happen.
sentence.Network_cn: 记住：保持乐观的心态，好事自然会发生。

sentence.Network_en: A fellow doesn't last long on what he has done. He's got to keep on delivering as he goes along.--Carl Hubbell, Baseball Player
sentence.Network_cn: 靠过去完成的无法让人保有成功，必须在路上持续交出成绩。

sentence.Network_en: Llewelyn was mounting the stairs up into the keep.
sentence.Network_cn: 卢埃林登上台阶，走进城堡主楼。

介词短语_百度百科 ... keep down 控制，压制，镇压；压低 keep off 不接近，避开 keep up 保持，维持；继续，坚持.

大学英语四级常用词组 ... in one's honour 向…表示敬意 keep house 管理家务；做家务 How about? … 如何？…怎么样？.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(K) ... keep good time 走得准 keep house 当家 keep in contact with 保持联络.

jx.jx_en_mean: To persevere in work or an action.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 坚持做…：继续某项工作或行为

jx.jx_en_mean: To prevent from growing, accomplishing, or succeeding
jx.jx_cn_mean: 压制，镇压：阻止…成长、完成或成功

lj.lj_ly: keep down prices; keep the revolutionaries down.
We asked her to stop talking, but she kept up.
lj.lj_ls: 我们请她别再说话了，但她依旧说下去

jx.jx_en_mean: To continue at the same level or pace.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 并行：按相同的水平或步伐继续下去

jx.jx_en_mean: To match one's competitors, colleagues, or neighbors in success or lifestyle
jx.jx_cn_mean: 不落后，赶得上：赶上对手、同事或邻居，指在成就或生活方式上

lj.lj_ly: unsuccessfully tried to keep up with his associates.

phrase.cizu_name: you can't keep a good man (或 woman) down

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)a competent person will always recover well from setbacks or problems
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)有能力的人是不会被挫折或问题吓倒

jx.jx_en_mean: make an effort to live normally when in a difficult situation
refuse to disclose or share something
try to maintain the same social and material standards as one's friends or neighbours
jx.jx_cn_mean: 与人攀比（试图与朋友或邻居保持同样的社会地位和物质水平）

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Old English cēpan 'seize, take in', also 'care for, attend to', of unknown origin

encyclopedia.content: keep是一个常用英语单词，既可以做及物动词也可以做不及物动词。常用释义为保持，保留如 keep a seat 等等。另外keep还是程序里的一个常用函数。

entry.def: If someone keeps or is kept in a particular state, they remain in it.

example.ex: The noise kept him awake...
example.tran: 噪音吵得他一直没有睡着。

example.ex: Reggie was being kept busy behind the bar...
example.tran: 雷吉一直在柜台后忙活。

entry.def: If you keep or you are kept in a particular position or place, you remain in it.

example.ex: Keep away from the doors while the train is moving...
example.tran: 列车运行过程中要远离车门。

example.ex: He kept his head down, hiding his features...
example.tran: 他低头掩面。

entry.def: If you keep off something or keep away from it, you avoid it. If you keep out of something, you avoid getting involved in it. You can also say that you keep someone off ,away from or out of something.

example.ex: I managed to stick to the diet and keep off sweet foods...
example.tran: 我努力做到了只吃规定饮食，不沾甜食。

example.ex: He's going to be a fantastic player if he keeps away from booze and women...
example.tran: 如果能不近酒色，他将成为一名出色的运动员。

entry.def: If someone or something keeps you from a particular action, they prevent you from doing it.

example.ex: Embarrassment has kept me from doing all sorts of things...
example.tran: 我总是害怕受窘，什么事都不敢去做。

example.ex: He kept her from being lonely...
example.tran: 他不让她感到孤独。

entry.def: If you try to keep from doing something, you try to stop yourself from doing it.

example.ex: She bit her lip to keep from crying...
example.tran: 她咬住嘴唇不哭。

example.ex: He had to lean on Dan to keep from falling.
example.tran: 他不得不靠在丹身上以免摔倒。

entry.def: If you keep something from someone, you do not tell them about it.

example.ex: She knew that Gabriel was keeping something from her.
example.tran: 她知道加布里埃尔有事瞒着她。

entry.def: If you keep doing something, you do it repeatedly or continue to do it.

example.ex: I keep forgetting it's December...
example.tran: 我总是忘了现在是12月了。

example.ex: I turned back after a while, but he kept walking...
example.tran: 我过了一会就往回走了，但他还接着走。

entry.tran: （与某些名词连用，表示持续一段时间或继续做某事）持续，继续（持有或控制）
entry.def: Keep is used with some nouns to indicate that someone does something for a period of time or continues to do it. For example, if you keep a grip on something, you continue to hold or control it.

example.ex: Until last year, the regime kept a tight grip on the country...
example.tran: 直到去年，那个国家还处于该政权的严密控制之下。

example.ex: One of them would keep a look-out on the road behind to warn us of approaching vehicles...
example.tran: 他们中会有一人看着后面的路，提醒我们注意过来的车辆。

entry.def: If you keep something, you continue to have it in your possession and do not throw it away, give it away, or sell it.

example.ex: 'I like this dress,' she said. 'Keep it. You can have it,' said Daphne...
example.tran: “我喜欢这件连衣裙，”她说。“留下吧。给你了，”达夫妮说道。

example.ex: Lathan had to choose between marrying her and keeping his job.
example.tran: 莱森不得不在娶她和保住工作之间作出选择。

entry.def: If you keep something in a particular place, you always have it or store it in that place so that you can use it whenever you need it.

example.ex: She kept her money under the mattress...
example.tran: 她把钱放在床垫下。

example.ex: She remembered where she kept the gun...
example.tran: 她记得放枪的地方。

entry.def: When you keep something such as a promise or an appointment, you do what you said you would do.

example.ex: I'm hoping you'll keep your promise to come for a long visit...
example.tran: 我希望你遵守诺言来这儿多呆几天。

example.ex: He had again failed to keep his word.
example.tran: 他又食言了。

entry.def: If you keep a record of a series of events, you write down details of it so that they can be referred to later.

example.ex: Eleanor began to keep a diary...
example.tran: 埃莉诺开始记日记了。

example.ex: The volunteers kept a record of everything they ate for a week.
example.tran: 志愿者记录下他们一周所吃的所有食物。

entry.def: If you keep yourself or keep someone else, you support yourself or the other person by earning enough money to provide food, clothing, money, and other necessary things.

example.ex: She could just about afford to keep her five kids...
example.tran: 她勉勉强强能养得起自己的5个孩子。

example.ex: I just cannot afford to keep myself...
example.tran: 我难以维持生计。

entry.def: Someone's keep is the cost of food and other things that they need in their daily life.

example.ex: Ray will earn his keep on local farms while studying...
example.tran: 雷求学期间会在当地的农场干活赚取生活费。

example.ex: I need to give my parents money for my keep.
example.tran: 我需要付给父母我的生活费。

entry.def: If you keep animals, you own them and take care of them.

example.ex: I've brought you some eggs. We keep chickens...
example.tran: 我给你带了些鸡蛋。我们养鸡。

example.ex: This mad writer kept a lobster as a pet.
example.tran: 这个疯狂的作家把龙虾当宠物养。

entry.def: If you keep a business such as a small shop or hotel, you own it and manage it.

example.ex: His father kept a village shop.
example.tran: 他父亲经营一家乡村商店。

entry.def: If someone or something keeps you, they delay you and make you late.

example.ex: Sorry to keep you, Jack...
example.tran: 很抱歉让你久等了，杰克。

example.ex: 'What kept you?' — 'I went in the wrong direction.'
example.tran: “你为什么晚了？”——“我走错了方向。”

entry.def: If food keeps for a certain length of time, it stays fresh and suitable to eat for that time.

example.ex: Whatever is left over may be put into the refrigerator, where it will keep for 2-3 weeks.
example.tran: 剩下的东西都可以放进冰箱，可以保持两到三个星期不坏。

entry.tran: （用于询问健康状况）保持健康
entry.def: You can say or ask how someone is keeping as a way of saying or asking whether they are well.

example.ex: She hasn't been keeping too well lately...
example.tran: 她最近身体不太好。

example.ex: How are you keeping these days?
example.tran: 你这些天身体怎么样？

entry.def: A keep is the main tower of a medieval castle, in which people lived.
If you keep at it, you continue doing something that you have started, even if you are tired and would prefer to stop.

example.ex: It may take a number of attempts, but it is worth keeping at it...
example.tran: 可能要试几次，但还是值得坚持的。

example.ex: 'Keep at it!' Thade encouraged me.
example.tran: “坚持下去！”萨德鼓励我道。

entry.def: Something that is for keeps is permanent and will not change.

example.ex: Ensure that whatever you gain now will be for keeps...
example.tran: 确保你现在所获得的一切永远不会失去。

example.ex: He advised them to leave town for keeps.
example.tran: 他建议他们离开镇子，永远别再回来。

entry.def: If you keep going, you continue moving along or doing something that you have started, even if you are tired and would prefer to stop.

example.ex: She forced herself to keep going...
example.tran: 她强迫自己继续下去。

example.ex: I was shouting: 'Keep going, keep going!'
example.tran: 我喊着：“坚持，坚持！”

entry.tran: 协调/不协调;一致/不一致
entry.def: If one thing is in keeping with another, it is suitable in relation to that thing. If one thing is out of keeping with another, it is not suitable in relation to that thing.

example.ex: His office was in keeping with his station and experience...
example.tran: 他的办公室与其身份和阅历相称。

example.ex: In keeping with tradition, the Emperor and Empress did not attend the ceremony...
example.tran: 按照传统，皇帝和皇后未参加该仪式。

entry.def: If you keep it up, you continue working or trying as hard as you have been in the past.

example.ex: There are fears that he will not be able to keep it up when he gets to the particularly demanding third year...
example.tran: 有人担心他到了要求极其严格的第3年时会坚持不下去。

example.ex: You're doing a great job! Keep it up!
example.tran: 你们干得非常棒！继续好好干吧！

entry.tran: 把…秘而不宣；不将…说出去
entry.def: If you keep something to yourself, you do not tell anyone else about it.

example.ex: I have to tell someone. I can't keep it to myself...
example.tran: 我得找人说说。我心里憋不住。

example.ex: There's one thing you can do for me. But keep it to yourself.
example.tran: 有件事你能帮我做。但你要保密。

entry.def: If you keep yourself to yourself or keep to yourself, you stay on your own most of the time and do not mix socially with other people.

example.ex: He was a quiet man who kept himself to himself...
example.tran: 他是个喜欢安静、不爱与人来往的人。

example.ex: Since she knows little Italian, she keeps to herself.
example.tran: 因为不怎么懂意大利语，她很少和人交往。

means.word_mean: 1. the financial means whereby one lives;

sentences.sentence: "each child was expected to pay for their keep"
"he applied to the state for support"
"he could no longer earn his own livelihood"

means.word_mean: 2. the main tower within the walls of a medieval castle or fortress
3. a cell in a jail or prison
1. keep in a certain state, position, or activity; e.g., "keep clean";

sentences.sentence: "hold in place"
"She always held herself as a lady"
"The students keep me on my toes"

means.word_mean: 2. continue a certain state, condition, or activity;

sentences.sentence: "Keep on working!"
"We continued to work into the night"
"Keep smiling"
"We went on working until well past midnight"
"Can I keep my old stuffed animals?"
"She kept her maiden name after she married"

means.word_mean: 4. prevent from doing something or being in a certain state;

sentences.sentence: "We must prevent the cancer from spreading"
"His snoring kept me from falling asleep"
"Keep the child from eating the marbles"

means.word_mean: 5. conform one's action or practice to;

sentences.sentence: "keep appointments"
"she never keeps her promises"
"We kept to the original conditions of the contract"
"The pianist kept time with the metronome"
"keep count"
"I cannot keep track of all my employees"

means.word_mean: 7. look after; be the keeper of; have charge of;

sentences.sentence: "He keeps the shop when I am gone"
"keep a diary"
"maintain a record"
"keep notes"
"He is keeping three women in the guest cottage"
"keep boarders"

means.word_mean: 10. allow to remain in a place or position;

sentences.sentence: "We cannot continue several servants any longer"
"She retains a lawyer"
"The family's fortune waned and they could not keep their household staff"
"Our grant has run out and we cannot keep you on"
"We kept the work going as long as we could"
"She alone sustained her family"
"The money will sustain our good cause"
"There's little to earn and many to keep"
"These potatoes keep for a long time"

means.word_mean: 13. celebrate, as of holidays or rites;

sentences.sentence: "Keep the commandments"
"celebrate Christmas"
"Observe Yom Kippur"

means.word_mean: 14. keep under control; keep in check;

sentences.sentence: "suppress a smile"
"Keep your temper"
"keep your cool"

means.word_mean: 15. maintain in safety from injury, harm, or danger;

sentences.sentence: "May God keep you"
"She keeps a few chickens in the yard"
"he keeps bees"
"keep my job for me while I give birth"
"keep my seat, please"
"keep open the possibility of a merger"
"Where do you keep your gardening tools?"
"I always keep batteries in the freezer"
"keep food for a week in the pantry"
"She keeps a sixpack and a week's worth of supplies in the refrigerator"
"I keep a car in the countryside"
"She keeps an apartment in Paris for her shopping trips"
"The student was kept after school"
"preserved meats"
"keep potatoes fresh"

list.explanation: 向(某人)提出要求或考验，使(某人)不能轻易过关

example.en: We'll ask her a few questions just to keep her honest.
example.zh: 我们要问她几个问题，只是考验考验她。

example.en: It has kept my eyes open that the boy stutters.
example.zh: 我已注意到了，这男孩子说活口吃。

example.en: He's keeping an eye out for a more profitable job.
example.zh: 他正在留心找个更能赚钱的工作。

auth_sentence.content: You can keep track of it by clicking here.
auth_sentence.res_content: You can keep track of it by clicking here.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You can keep track of it by clicking here.

auth_sentence.content: They should just keep doing what they're doing.
auth_sentence.res_content: They should just keep doing what they're doing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They should just keep doing what they're doing.

auth_sentence.content: What's the fuel used to keep it burning?
auth_sentence.res_content: What's the fuel used to keep it burning?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What's the fuel used to keep it burning?

sentences.en: I think we shall keep friends.
sentences.cn: 我想我们要保持朋友关系。

sentences.en: The fish won't keep long; we must eat it now.
sentences.cn: 这鱼无法保存很久, 我们必须现在就把它吃掉。

means.word_mean: 保有, 保存, 保留

sentences.en: Why didn't Daddy let me keep the ten dollars?
sentences.cn: 爸爸为什么不让我留下这十美元?

sentences.en: Will you keep us the seats?
sentences.cn: 你给我们保留座位好吗?

means.word_mean: 阻止, 防止, 耽搁

jushi.english: You'd better finish the ice cream; it won't keep.
jushi.chinese: 你最好把冰淇淋吃完,这东西放不得。

jushi.english: In such weather meat won't keep long.
jushi.chinese: 在这样的天气,肉放时间长了要坏的。
